Canelo Álvarez se dobla ante su pequeña hija María Fernanda
El boxeador mexicano Saúl "Canelo" Álvarez dio este viernes una muestra de ternura al ver a su pequeña hija durante la ceremonia de pesaje
02 Nov 2019, 13:50 by Cornelio Figueroa
El boxeador mexicano Saúl “Canelo” Álvarez se muestra inquebrantable, con pocos gestos, muestra seguridad e impacta su físico durante la ceremonia de pesaje previo a un combate, sin embargo, el pasado viernes mostró que hay una persona que lo manda a la lona de un solo golpe, su pequeña hija María Fernanda.
“Canelo” y Kovalev tuvieron este viernes la ceremonia de pesaje previo a su combate de esta noche en el MGM Grand Garden de Las Vegas, el primero en ser llamado fue el ruso, después cuando llamaron al mexicano, el pelirrojo se mostró firme, imponente y con un gesto de seriedad, sin embargo, al ver a su hija esto cambio, “Canelo” antes de subir a la bascula, se acercó a María Fernanda para saludarla y enviarle corazones y besos.



El pugilista tapatío fue el primero en subir a la báscula, y sin ningún problema dio 174.5 libras, media libra menos que el peso pactado para el combate. Pero el que no dio el peso en su primera oportunidad fue Kovalev.






Pero eso poco le importó a “Canelo”, pues mientras el ruso intentaba dar las 175 libras, el tapatío se acercó a su hija para tomarla en brazos, besarla y jugar con ella mientras su rival estaba luchando con la bascula.


Saúl "Canelo" Álvarez tomando en los brazos a su hija María Fernanda durante la ceremonia de pesaje/AFP

Cabe señalar que esta no es la primera ocasión en que se puede observar al boxeador teniendo muestras de cariño hacia su hija, ya que en una de las últimas conferencias de prensa previo al combate, “Canelo” se la paso enviando besos y corazones María Fernanda que observaba a su padre desde los primeros lugares del recinto.














Saúl Álvarez

text:
Canelo Álvarez bends before his little daughter María Fernanda
Mexican boxer Saúl "Canelo" Álvarez gave a show of tenderness on Friday when he saw his little daughter during the weighing ceremony
02 Nov 2019, 13:50 by Cornelio Figueroa
The Mexican boxer Saúl “Canelo” Álvarez is unwavering, with few gestures, shows security and impacts his physique during the pre-combat weighing ceremony, however, last Friday he showed that there is a person who sends him to the canvas of one blow, his little daughter Maria Fernanda.
"Canelo" and Kovalev had this Friday the weighing ceremony prior to their fight tonight at the MGM Grand Garden in Las Vegas, the first to be called was the Russian, then when they called the Mexican, the redhead was firm, imposing and with a gesture of seriousness, however, seeing his daughter this change, "Canelo" before climbing the scale, approached Maria Fernanda to greet her and send her hearts and kisses.



The boxer Tapatio was the first to climb the scale, and without any problem gave 174.5 pounds, half a pound less than the agreed weight for combat. But the one who did not give weight on his first chance was Kovalev.






But that cared little to "Canelo", because while the Russian tried to give 175 pounds, the Tapatio approached his daughter to take her in his arms, kiss her and play with her while his rival was fighting with the scale.


Saúl "Canelo" Álvarez taking his daughter María Fernanda in the arms during the weighing ceremony / AFP

It should be noted that this is not the first time that the boxer can be observed having signs of affection for his daughter, since in one of the last press conferences prior to the fight, “Canelo” spent his time sending kisses and hearts María Fernanda who watched his father from the first places of the enclosure.
